user_input: Modify the DHEM model. Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level; create a variation of that file by copying the H2\Gas file and setting all non-zero values to 999; create a new datafile object in the Datafile class using the Gas Pipeline category named to reflect PCIPMI capacities Unlimited and add the filename property; add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities; update each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class by adding a max flow property referencing the new datafile and scenario; clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995' to create a new model called 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline' and add the new scenario to it.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the DHEM Model specifications.

tasks.description: Retrieve the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level using the CRUD pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input 'Modify the DHEM model.', select the appropriate datafile attribute from the Gas Pipeline Capacity file.

tasks.description: Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by copying the H2\Gas file and setting all non-zero values to 999.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input 'Modify the DHEM model.', select the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for PCIPMI infrastructure for modification.

function_args.user_input: set all values that aren't 0 to 999

tasks.description: Create a new datafile object in the Datafile class using the Gas Pipeline category, naming it to reflect 'PCIPMI capacities Unlimited'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input 'Modify the DHEM model.', determine the proper naming structure for the new datafile object in the Gas Pipeline category.

tasks.description: Add the filename property to the newly created datafile object with the name of the datafile just created.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input 'Modify the DHEM model.', update the newly created datafile object with the filename property reflecting the new datafile.

tasks.description: Add a scenario named 'unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities' to the model.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input 'Modify the DHEM model.', select the appropriate model context to add the new scenario.

tasks.description: Update each object in the H2 interconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the gas pipeline class by adding a max flow property that references the new datafile and scenario.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input 'Modify the DHEM model.', identify the relevant objects and update them with the max flow property referencing the new datafile and scenario.

tasks.description: Clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995' to create a new model called 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input 'Modify the DHEM model.', clone the specified model to prepare for integrating the new scenario.

tasks.description: Add the new scenario to the cloned model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's input 'Modify the DHEM model.', add the previously created scenario to the cloned model.
